name: SoulBound (itch) (Torterrad)
description:
Soulbound is a 2 player vs game where one player controls a ninja and the other controls a ghost. The ninja gains points by progressing through the level and can defeat enemies with a sword attack meanwhile the ghost can possess 5 unique enemies to have full control over their actions to try and kill the ninja, which will then cause them to switch roles. Some of these enemies include exploding pufferfish, charging dinosaurs, bouncing frogs and more. This chaotic platformer has a lot to offer as randomly generated levels help keep the game fresh and replayable and the unique twist of being able to control enemies to sabotage a player leads to a lot of fun interactions. 

To play simply download the zip file, extract it and run the game, have fun :)

Created by: Peter Cheshire, Paul Haynes, Kacper Nowak and Michal Majkowski
